definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: The ever popular 'Akon' has also recorded at Creative Kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 红极一时的阿肯也曾经在创新王国录制歌曲。

sentences.english: The comment exploded on the Internet, becoming the country's newest catch phrase.
sentences.chinese: 这一言论经网络曝光后，成为红极一时的网络用语。

sentences.english: He was written off as a has-been.
sentences.chinese: 作为曾经是红极一时的人物，他现已湮没无闻。

sentences.english: A smash hit in Japan, the Cube finally wends its way to America.
sentences.chinese: 阿红极一时，在日本，立方体最后文德途中美国。

definition: fashionable for a while (idiom); all the rage
to achieve fame among one's contemporaries (idiom); temporary or local celebrity
to win instant success (idiom)/to become an instant hit
to be popular/to be in luck/to have good luck/to develop smoothly
currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)
to be a big hit/to be hugely popular
understood by everyone (idiom); well known/a household name
north and south sides of the Yangtze River (idiom)/(fig.) all over China
to be popular for a while/to be all the rage for a time
in those days/then/in those years/during that time
to make one's name/to become famous
